ptserver.communication

Class ProxyValueListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptserver.communication.ProxyValueListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueListener

    public class ProxyValueListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueListener
    A value listener that listens to changes made to a variable widget and publishes the changes as an AttributeChangeToken.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Peter Foldes
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (pdf)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (pdf)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyValueListener(TokenPublisher tokenPublisher)
      Initialize the instance with the given token publisher and enable its listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenPublisher getTokenPublisher()
      Return TokenPublisher that would be used to publish AttributeChange tokens produced by this actor on value change.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Return the enabled flag of the listener.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Set enabled flag of the listener.
      void valueChanged(Settable settable)
      Capture value changes of the settable and send them via the publisher to the remote model.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set enabled flag of the listener. If it's true, the listener would send the attribute value change token.
        Parameters:
        enabled - the enabled flag.
        See Also:
        isEnabled()

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Return the enabled flag of the listener. If it's true, the listener would send the attribute value change token.
        Returns:
        the enabled flag.
